title: Obari
author: Obari
content: There's actually so much to learn on here and one thing evident here is the fact that learning never ends.I came across the Bitcointalk supernotifier bot just three days ago and I've found it's features very interesting as it helps a user keep track of his or her activities and engagement on the forum.I believe alot of established members of the forum already have and use this bot and upon my registration with the bot, I've been able to keep track of all my engagements on the forum and I'm recommending the bot to users who might be interested.The bot helps in the following ways:~ Notifies you when any user mentions your name on the forum~ Notifies you when you're been quoted.~ Notifies you when you earn new merits~ Notifies you when there is a new post on your watched threads .With these features I believe one isn't expected to miss out of any engagement in the forum, so i thought it wise to bring it up here  and below is the link to the bothttps://t.me/BTTSuperNotifier_bot~Obari~

comments.author: Rikafip
comments.body: Btw that's not the only way to get notified when someone mentioned you or reply to your post as there's also  LoyceV's notification bot for those who don't use Telegram.

comments.author: Cointxz
comments.body: I once use notifier before which really helps me to track all the reply on my comment. One thing that I don’t like about this notification is if someone that you didn’t like reply or mention on a post that you didn’t want to read. There’s no feature back then to exclude user by notifying which defeats the purpose of ignore button feature of the forum. To be honest, the notifier on telegram is a bliss for a thread starter because you will become updated on the comments that being address to you in regards with the topic. I hope forum will have a notification function instead of relying to 3rd party apps just to get a notification.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Yes I think the one made by TryNinja is really helpful, seeing some mentioned or merits being flagged is superb feature. Ive been using the telegram bot notifier since then cause sometimes I dont know if someone mentioned or reply to my topic.

comments.author: Maus0728
comments.body: To add, I am also using what LoyceV has made in the past for monitoring the topics or posts created by specific forum members[1]. And as far as I know, Tryninja is also planning to add a similar feature to his Bitcointalk Supernotifier bot, but I am not sure when it will be implemented.I mainly use it to notify me when krog posted his free raffles though  .[1] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5204188.0
